visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a bullet chart with the following specifications: Chart type: bullet, Chart title: '2024 YTD', Axes and labels styling: Custom colors for plot bands and labels, Data series: Revenue, Profit, and New Customers with their respective data and target values, Custom colors: Specific colors for plot bands and series, Additional configurations: Inverted chart, specific margins, no legend, and no credits.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a bullet chart with specific settings. The chart type is set to 'bullet', and it is inverted with a left margin of 135 pixels and a top margin of 40 pixels. The chart title is '2024 YTD'. The x-axis categories include 'Revenue', 'Profit', and 'New Customers' with their respective units. The y-axis has plot bands with custom colors to represent different ranges. The data series includes three data points for Revenue, Profit, and New Customers, each with a target value. The tooltip displays the actual value and the target value. The legend is disabled, and credits are also disabled to maintain a clean chart appearance.
